mapper.select: SELECT prf_uid "uid", prf_id "id", prf_name "name", prf_from "from", prf_to "to", prf_fcltynm "fcltynm", prf_poster "poster", prf_state "state", prf_openrun "openrun", th_uid "tuid" FROM Perform WHERE prf_state = '공연중' ORDER BY prf_from DESC

SELECT prf_uid "uid", prf_id "id", prf_name "name", prf_from "from", prf_to "to", prf_fcltynm "fcltynm", prf_poster "poster", prf_state "state", prf_openrun "openrun", th_uid "tuid",prf_ticketprice "ticketprice", prf_runday "runday", prf_runtime "runtime" FROM Perform WHERE prf_uid=#{uid}

SELECT p.PRF_NAME "prfname", k.prf_id "prfid", k.relprf_id "relprfid", k.sim "sim", k.prf_name "relprfname", k.prf_poster "relprfposter", k.prf_uid "reluid", k.PRF_FCLTYNM "relprffacilty" FROM (SELECT r.rec_uid "uid", r.prf_id, r.relprf_id, r.sim, p.PRF_NAME, p.PRF_POSTER, p.PRF_UID, p.PRF_FCLTYNM FROM PerformRec r, favperform f, Perform p WHERE f.user_uid=#{userid} and r.prf_id = f.prf_uid AND r.relprf_id = p.prf_id ORDER BY r.prf_id) k, PERFORM p WHERE k.prf_id = p.prf_id
